How Now Brown Cow?

Aug 11, 2004

I give up.. weeks ago CERT told everyone not to use IE anymore and every open source zealot (yes, me) started chanting, 'Firefox! Firefox! Firefox! '.. I'd even managed to convert a couple of friends recently (1 end user, 1 developer) to junk IE related browsers.

But hey, now there's Firefox UI Spoofing? *Phooey* (note to self: Gotta learn XUL!)

So my options now are.. *drum roll*
4. Use Op(lease)era browser. (hello adware)
3. Use text browser Lynx (bye bye pr0n pics)
2. Use telnet (bye bye modern world)
1. Use another person's PC.

-sigh-
